body: How to find some more such sensory deprivation doujins?
XD
Thank you very much ndus,much appreciate

To the posts below, the only other one I can think of that's *kinda* similar is #262538, which is also by Hakaba. There are a few other shorter-term sensory deprivation stories out there. You can sometimes find them by searching some combination of "masked face," "gag," and/or "latex." Unfortunately, uploaders on this site don't tag very well, so it's easy to overlook stuff. :(
